Mods.LoadCommand:
%xero(function(self) if not P1 or not P2 then backToSongWheel('Two Player Mode Required') return end
-- judgment / combo proxies for pn = 1, 2 do setupJudgeProxy(PJ[pn], P[pn]:GetChild('Judgment'), pn) setupJudgeProxy(PC[pn], P[pn]:GetChild('Combo'), pn) end -- player proxies for pn = 1, #PP do PP[pn]:SetTarget(P[pn]) P[pn]:hidden(1) end -- your code goes here here:
dofile ('lua/sunfish/sunfish.lua')
end)
